title: The Story of Unforgettable Witch - Novel Updates
tags: Eidetic Memory   Genius Protagonist   Living Alone   Loneliness   Time Loop
author: Usa Naraharu
description:
Even if today will end up disappearing, these feelings will not vanish. 

An everyday life in which nothing happens, with each day being slightly strange. 

The slightly mysterious story of my and her clumsy feelings.>
